wikitext.*:
The '''First Eastfarthing Troop''' was a troop of the [[Watch]] formed during the troubled times in [[the Shire]] under the rule of [[Sharkey]]. The [[Shirriffs]] of the troop was based in the [[Shirriff-house]] at [[Frogmorton]] on the [[East Road]]. It was the First Eastfarthing Troop that attempted to arrest [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] and the [[Travellers]] on their return journey to [[Bag End]].   They could not keep up with the mounted Travellers on foot so they parted at [[Three-Farthing Stone]]. They arrived at Bywater shortly before the first skirmish with the [[Ruffians]]. Most of them took off their feathers and joined in the revolt aside from a few who slunk away. <ref>{{RK|VI8}}</ref>
